landing.title: About Us
landing.description: Learn about Amy and Amika Thai Massage & Wellness Bedford. Fully qualified therapist from Buriram, Thailand with 16 years in the UK, combining authentic Thai massage traditions with professional therapeutic care.

section.title: Welcome to Professional Therapeutic Care in Bedford
section.paragraph1: I'm Amy, a fully qualified massage therapist from Buriram, Thailand, and I've made Bedford my home for the past 16 years. After working as a professional therapist in Bedford for over two years, I opened Amika Thai Massage & Wellness in October 2025 to create a dedicated space where authentic Thai healing traditions meet modern clinical standards.
section.paragraph2: My approach combines the ancient wisdom of traditional Thai massage with evidence-based therapeutic techniques. As a sole practitioner, I provide consistent, personalised care where I can build trusting relationships with clients and track their progress over time. My home studio is set up as a professional treatment space where I can provide safe, effective massage therapy in a clean, comfortable environment.
section.paragraph3: I hold VTCT Level 3 certification in Thai Massage, along with specialized qualifications in Deep Tissue, Pregnancy Massage, Lymphatic Drainage, Aromatherapy, and Hot Stone techniques. But qualifications are just the foundationâ€”what drives me is seeing clients find genuine relief from pain, tension, and stress. I'm committed to changing lives through the power of therapeutic touch, one treatment at a time.
section.paragraph4: This is more than a business to me. It's my calling, my passion, and my contribution to Bedford's wellbeing. I invite you to experience the difference that professional, compassionate, evidence-based massage therapy can make in your life.
